评论详情: The jacket is very well made, the color is consistent, perhaps better than what is seen in the photo, the correct size for my measurement, which is normally M, I recommend it.
Nice jacket. Exactly as expected from the description. Slightly wrinkled but nothing that couldn't be ironed out.

Classic tweed pattern and quality construction. However, the sizing runs large, so consider ordering a size down for a better fit. While it delivers great vintage appeal, ensuring the right size is key to fully enjoying this blazer.
Well worth the money
Beautifully made even though it is made in China with English logs ! Price is right
Runs small in length

评论用户: Not effective. The garlic smell was bad and still didn't deter the cat from unwantedareas.
评论详情: The Pant And blazer did not match in color.I ordered them separately but this was still unexpected. They were both by the same designer and company. This Material will differ slightly but not to this extent. Boxy shoulders.
Quality and traditional good looks that never goes out of style. Country squire in casual understated  good taste.

Didn't know what to expect from Amazon l, but this is nice. Beautiful herringbone pattern. Not itchy and uncomfortable. More of a slim fit great for athletic builds. I'm 5' 7" 170lb muscular build and a medium was just right. Enough room for a button up shirt and undershirt underneath.

Material was nice, would have been comfortable, but for me (6’3”/180lbs) the fit was garbage. The biggest, squarest, most boxy jacket I’ve ever put on. If you’re a bit extra husky this will be a great jacket. If you’re of an athletic build or slim, don’t waste your time.
One of my favorite blazers. Classic look at an affordable price.
Great fall colors. Husband loves fit and material.
I’m 6’2”, 185lb and the fit in the medium is perfect.

I am 6" tall and 190lb, I ordered a large. It fit well in the shoulders, but a little bit short in the arms. The worst is the waist I could wrap it around me and overlap the button area by 8". It was so big in the waist I'll have to have it taken in (the cost is $55) if I want to keep it. The fabric is decent, but certainly not expensive.

Amazing blazer and perfect fit.  I don't need to tailored it. Even the pockets were already open didn't need to cut/brake open the outside and inside pockets. Only needed to cut open the vent at the back.
bad materiel. wrong size

评论概述: It's looks betray it's reasonable price.
评论详情: The Sport Coat arrived as promised. It came folded and sealed in a plastic bag. Upon opening it, I was first impressed with the feel of the material. It's soft and substantial. That's a worry in the day of nothing but man made fibers. This was a blend of wool and of course, polyester. But the blend was sufficient that it felt and smelled like wool.  The coat was wrinkled fairly significantly right out of the bag. I did an initial try on to ensure that I wanted to keep it and the fit was on point. After that, I took a warm iron to it and the wrinkles were soon a memory.  I got the black herringbone pattern. I'm happy with the color, black, and the overall cut of the jacket. It was fit in all of the right places, shoulder and chest, and a bit forgiving in the abdomen. Which is good, there's nothing worse than that pull that you often see in mens jackets when buttoned.  I have broad shoulders and about a 45 inch chest, the XL accommodated that. The sleeve and overall jacket length was just perfect, no need for tailoring.  If you're looking for a presentable, good fitting sports coat, then you can't go wrong with this choice. I suspect there'll be another one or two in different colors and patterns in my future.
Great material at an even better price. Fit my husband perfectly. Easy versatility. It could be dressed up or down. My husband looked amazing and received so many compliments.

评论概述: The refund is taking too long
评论详情: We got the blazer size XL which was too large and it was like unpacked before us. We packed it as well as possible and returned. I purchased another one size down L. It is great. It's new packed well and it is fitting right to size. Doesn't smell anything, looks elegant, my husband is happy and the colour is beautiful dark blue.  I'm wondering how long the refund for the first blazer could take? Thank you

评论概述: Decent Material, Good Quality, Shortest Arms I've Ever seen
评论详情: Absolutely loved the look of this thing. Loved the fit on the shoulders and chest. But the arms were literally 3 inches too short for me. I'm 6'3" and weigh 250.
Fits really good my husband really love this

评论概述: The Length varies for different colors in the same size
评论详情: I bought a Brown one and a Blue one, both the same size, and one is 1.5"  longer at the  hips than the other.
Really a good fit, Good material
Got this for a musical my son was in. It fit him perfect!

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for
评论详情: If you are looking to look like a college professor this works great. I got it for a cosplay and I am perfectly happy with it.
Classy old school! Retro blazer! Goes with anything!
Great quality and style!
This coat is a great value! Well built, great quality, and great price!
perfect fit, good material and well made, would buy couple more styles!
Fabric good/ perfect waist good/perfect sleeve short/ no good height short / no good  Im 6.2''
Actually pretty nice for the money
I'd be embarrassed to wear this in public.

评论概述: Ok for wearing for a short period without activity
评论详情: This is an ok blazer which looks good to start. However if you are going to be doing any activity at all in it, it pills very easily. We used this for a theatre production and by performance 3 it was pilling at the wrists, under the arms and back of the collar. By the end of 9 performances it looked like it had been through the war including a large tear near the should seem after the actor raised his arms above his head.  So if you need it for a one off for say a funeral or a wedding it’s great. But beyond that, get a better quality jacket.

评论概述: You get what you pay for with this sport coat
评论详情: Not the best fit nor quality. Not sure why these are being sold on Amazon.
Looked very cheap. Not what I expected. Returned
The coat feels roomy yet classy, and I would most likely invest in a second one.
Poor quality
Great with jeans or black slacks.  Adds a touch of class to an otherwise humdrum outfit.  Fits well.
Didn't need to try on, immediately realized low product quality upon seeing fabric.

评论概述: Stylish and Sophisticated, Yet Also Casual
评论详情: My husband was very happy with this blazer, which I bought as a holiday gift. It's casual yet conveys professionalism. Can wear over jeans, cords or dressier trousers. Looks great with a sweater vest.

I purchased this for my fiancé to wear on our wedding day! I’m very pleased with the quality. It’s fairly lightweight, which is great. It fits him very nicely without the need for tailoring. I used the size chart and took his measurements, and the jacket turned out to be very true to the chart provided.
I'm 5'11 Broad shouldered 230 lb I ordered the XL fits okay but not comfortable material is lightweight not much material support on shoulder overall okay jacket

I'm very pleased with this jacket. The material is nice, it's really nicely tailored and has a nice pocket square to boot. I feel the peak lapels are a nice detail and dress it up a little. It looks great with Jean's and came almost wrinkled free, needing just a touch of steam to smooth out. It's actually thick enough to provide s p.o me warmth so I'm looking forward for this New England winter to let up so I can use it as an outer layer.
Exactly what I was looking for and as described. Only con is that the buttons look like they’ll need to be sewn on better.

评论概述: Nice looking jacket, seems well made.
评论详情: We got this on a lightening deal, but even at full price it's a great deal. I think it's well made and very attractive! Looks great on my husband! He looked a long time for something he could wear with jeans and a tee shirt or dress up. It was creased where it had been folded, but easily steamed out. My husband is VERY broad shouldered (and picky). He couldn't wear anything heavy under it, but a tee shirt or button up work fine. Very pleased with the jacket. Even ordered a second one. He is about 5' 10" and about 200 lbs. Ordered an XL.

It is highly disappointing that 85% of garments made in China use a different sizing chart than clothes Americans are accustomed to. I am a true XL for comfort. Typically, I can get away with L, but most of these garments are tight for me.  This blazer is walking the fine line, and should not earn the XL tag. It is undersized, false sizing claim.  I will eluctantly keep it, against my better judgment. I will only buy clothing after trying them on moving forward, not on Amazon.

Honestly, this sports coat is awesome for its tier level (Under $100) because of how great the quality of the stitching, and the overall fit which is leaning more towards the modern slim. The sleeves are not baggy which attributes to sleekness of the sports coat. The torso area also tapers in a bit which makes it comfortable, but not too slim where love handles will show. It's always a good thing to have at least one great sports coat/blazer in one's wardrobe.
The jacket was made from thinner fabric than you’d expect! Size was too small in the shoulder so I sent it back.
It is made of quality material. The color is deep and beautiful like it is not faded color. The style is average I could say. Overall, it is nice.
The fit was perfect for me and the material is high quality. If I wore suits more often I'd buy different colors.

I love the blazer, seems to be made well and it looks great other than the fact that the packaging was all wrong. I received the blazer packaged in nothing more than plastic bag and it was a wrinkled mess. How hard would it have been to properly package a $80 blazer in a box so it wouldn’t look like it came from the trash. 😡

评论概述: High Quality Fabric, Mid Quality Look
评论详情: I got this blazer to match with some gray slacks and use it as an interviewing suit.  When I first tried it on, I was satisfied with the comfort and feel of the material, both being rather nice.  I went to show my girlfriend and her first comment was "That looks like an old man's suit".  I had a look in the mirror and also felt like the look was a bit dated.  It is as advertised, though the look suffers a bit in real life.  The fit was very nice and exactly as expected.
Fit well ordered one size up…. 250 lbs 6’0
its made in china.  NO

评论概述: Size ran small in the shoulders
评论详情: A little small around the shoulders

评论概述: Very fine coat for the price
评论详情: This is a very fine jacket for the price. I am 6'4" with a large build and typically wear a 46L suit jacket. The XL fits quite nice with plenty of space. I do wish the sleeves and the coat itself was a little longer (The XXL and XL appear to be the same length according to the size chart), but this is no issue.

评论概述: My tailor likes this blazer even more than I do
评论详情: This is a quality product. The arms were a bit too long, so I took it to my tailor. She examined it and said it's not cheap and is well-made, admiring the craftsmanship and material. It looks great on me and goes well with respectable jeans and khakis - a welcome addition to my wardrobe.

评论概述: Well made herringbone men’s sport jacket
评论详情: This is a very nice charcoal tweed Men’s sport coat.  It fits well and is very warm actually.  I recommend this with black khakis and a dark tie or no tie.  It also looks great with jeans.  It’s a nice heavier blend so it works on the Winter and Fall.  I wouldn’t wear this in the Spring.It fits perfectly to size so order how you normally would.  It is a regular fit bit make sure you buy the right size.  If you buy it too small, it will pull at the sides when you button it.I like that it came with a colored four square for the pocket which gives it a pop of color.  It’s made very well and I definitely recommend it to add to your wardrobe.  Five stars!
For the price point, it surpasses expectations. Fits great and surprisingly decent quality. The jacket is can be worn for a variety of occasions and thats the reason I had in mind when I purchased.

Sharp looking wool blazer. Can be matched with slacks or jeans for for a good look either way. Good quality of material and liner/pockets. Fit as expected using their size chart. Good value for the quality.

First ordered XL as recommended by size chart...  way too big. returned and exchanged for a size large and that was too small.  Both were creased terribly, be prepared to do a lot of work steaming/ pressing
I was very surprised at the quality definitely worth tailoring

Value for money is ok and equal to the quality and material. Runs a bit on the larger size (I got a size small and a bit loose on me) I hope the sides were fitted a bit more on the slime size and not much straight like what the pictures show. Nice and good stitching and comfortable for casual days.

评论概述: It's important to size up when deciding on this PJ Herringbone Wool Blazer
评论详情: Well this PJ PAUL JONES Men's Herringbone Blazer British Wool Blend Vintage Sport Coats Jacket was not a good fit for me and I'm a slim fit guy and this jacket was too snug on me and I did not have on a dress shirt. Nice quality jacket, love the added touch of providing a pocket square.  But be aware that the jacket does run small.  The jacket is a nice quality well made has that Irish type cut and feel to it.  But what was more surprising is the wool feel of this jacket but upon closer inspection its only 25% wool certainly making it a wool blend jacket. But a super expansion to a mans wardrobe there is so much to do in wearing this jacket during the upcoming fall, winter months where its chiller.  Pretty good price point for a jacket of its quality. Unfortunately its not a good fit for me. I'd still recommend this to anyone upgrading their fall wardrobe a nice piece and addition given the price point.

评论概述: Beautiful classical look. Definitely looks above its asking price.
评论详情: This is a style that my dad used to wear, unfortunately my older brother inherited the wardrobe but as i enter a stage where i enjoy wearing jackets and blazers other than just for formal and business settings, my sport coats collection has been growing, and i think Paul Jones knocked it out of the park with this one.  This is my first herringbone blazer. I know these are traditionally made of wool, but of course that'd quadruple the price, instead we got something here with these hybrids that while may not match the durability, definitely looks slightly erm... "tidier" when it comes to the fiber fuzz.  The fit was perfect to my size and didn't need any modifications/tailoring, it was slightly tight on the shoulders but somehow i like it that way, it's probably due to being a sport blazer.  The color matches the listing and the inside liner feels very good, people tend to underestimate how the liner plays a role on the overall feeling, if its soft or stays cool or warm, but this one felt fine.  The coat came a little squeezed in the bag instead of carefully folded so it came with significant creasing, it was solved at home with some steam but it is unusual to come so wrinkled, but it may have been the shipping process so i can't blame Paul Jones.  I've worn this with Jeans and a button shirt and a turtleneck sweater and it looks just fantastic.  Overall i'm very happy with it and Paul Jones offer a wide range of casual and formal apparel to definitely take a look at, recommended!
I bought this jacket on the daily deal and I love it! I’m a big fan of peak lapels and ticket pockets. Excellent for the fall weather!

Me and hubs like to go out to dinner maybe twice a month-ish and some place require a suit coat. I thought it would be handy to grab one of these blazers to keep in the closet for those occasions. Sure glad I did! Even though this coat is an extra large I have noticed that it fits my husband like a glove. His weight fluctuates anywhere between 230 - 250 anti 6 ft 3 so I needed one that was long enough and that would accommodate with weight fluctuation. At either size I noticed this coat fits like a glove! It does has decorative pockets, they're not functional. The bottom of the hem on the back is not open, it is sewn together at the bottom. Wrinkle free even at the back of the closet! The little pocket square is removable. There are buttons on the cuffs which add to the aesthetic of the coat itself. I do like the multicolor facets in the stitching. A great wardrobe staple at a good price!

评论概述: Fit perfectly, looks great on him
评论详情: This is a nice low-budget option for a good-looking wool-ish men's jacket.  It looks great in person and fit perfectly according to his measurements.  For the price, it's a steal!

I'm a user of suits, suit coats, and general formal business attire a minimum of 3 days a week.  This suit coat surprised me so much, I bought two more from this company within a few days of getting this one. What a value!  Quality is totally on par with suit coats costing $75 - $150 at a number of the national department stores, depending on sales and supply.  I ordered bigger than I needed being burned over and over again with no-name brands and lack of real size adaptation the North American Male can trust . The size chart here was accurate - and what's better, accurate with both of the additional suit coats I bought from PJ Paul Jones.  This jacket is indeed a wool blend and IS NOT in my opinion an all season jacket. It is thick, and hot. I'll use it plenty this winter.  Negative to buying suit coats this way is the work you need to put in to make them look their best before you wear them. I use a combination of a steamer and then an iron to work out the wrinkles - which are significant and tough to remove. Once they are however, you have a great suit coat at an amazing cost.  If you're expecting super high quality at this price, you're bound to be disappointed. But, if you're looking to augment your wardrobe and expand the depth of options to you, what a great choice in PJ Paul Jones. Hopefully, they stay this affordable after more discover the value!

评论概述: Matches With Almost Anything, High Quality For The Price
评论详情: Love this blazer for the versatility.  It's great for dressing up, but also looks super with a pair of jeans and a t-shirt for a more casual style.  It can match a wide array of pants and shirts of varying colors.  The thickness and weight are a happy Goldilocks medium, being neither flimsy nor too hot and heavy.  My size fits very well other than the sleeves being slightly long, but no biggie.  It did come folded up with some initial wrinkles, but I'm pretty sure those will disappear after hanging for awhile.  The price is very reasonable for this level of quality compared to a store.
Great quality fabric with a classy look. Nice fit and comfortable

评论概述: Got to hand it to PJ ...
评论详情: They put out a quality garment at an amazingly low rate in today's dollars.  Fits me great.  Nicely made.  The handkerchief was a fun surprise.  (I have a couple other jackets of theirs and they're nice too.)

For the pricepoint, if you can get the sizing down and get a piece that fits well, this is probably a great pickup. The quality is good, it is a bit heavy but of course that is to be expected. It certainly doesn't feel cheap, and is of decent quality all around.

I was a bit skeptical when ordering this.  Too many times jackets come in oversized in sleeve length or have colors which do not lay well.  This one has none of those problems!It will arrive folded in a pouch yet don't fret.  The material will shake out and look good after about 2 days of hanging.  The sleeve length is just right....not too long or too short (I have trouble with sleeves seeming too long).  The back of the coat is not open at its "tail" so you will feel a tailored look while wearing it.  It is not snug that way....though you may worry about it at first since your other jacks may have a split or two in the back tail area.I received a couple of compliments on it already...just trying it on at home!  I am anxious for cooler weather to arrive to look stylin' at some event.
very nice

评论概述: I like the way it is cut and my wife likes the way it looks on me
评论详情: This is a great jacket. I like the way it is cut and my wife likes the way it looks on me. My wife does think that the sleeves are a little long for me, but I am used to that, since I have always needed a "short" in dress jackets - but she thinks the length is right for me. The color and pattern (black/gray) are just right for me. The fabric has a good feel to it, yet it is rigid enough to hold its shape well. I bought this mostly to wear for weddings and special occasions, but it is so comfortable that I may pull it out to wear for any occasion this winter, including Sunday morning church.

I didn't expect such a nice quality blazer for the price. I expected it to be thin, but it's nice and thick. Fits well, almost as if it was tailored to me. Looks and feels great. A bit heavy for warmer months, but would be a really nice option in fall/winter.
The coat arrived 2days early and the quality was better than I expected fit was also better than expected, good deal 👍

This was a great fit for me (167 lb / 5'10). I was a bit dubious about the herringbone pattern, but it looks pretty good.  PRO - Attractive fit out of the "box" - Interior pocket - Nice touch with the faux hankerchief  CON -Only one interior pocket (more is better) -Only 25% wool  Recommended to add class to your Zoom / Teams / Webex calls.  Handles folding pretty well, but not as well as a 100% wool coat.  I wear this with collarless shirts.

When I first unfolded the jacket it was all wrinkled and creased. The jacket does not fit me as expected - it is a little undersized. When I put it on it felt heavy and clumpy. I was hoping for more of a sports jacket feel. This is not what I expected.

As always, you should carefully look over the sizing chart to make sure all the dimensions fit you. But my size worked extremely well and I'm impressed by the quality. It seems very well made and I'm planning on enjoying it for a long time.  This is on the warm size, so it's good for fall and winter but might get sweaty in the summer. You'll also want to straighten it out and perhaps take a lint roller to it right after unboxing, but that's to be expected with clothes ordered online!

Love the color, feels warm which is nice for winter. I usually wear size large and for this jacket I can barely close the button. Probably won't bother so it does not look too tight. The length for the jacket and arm is perfect. I gave it a 4 star bcs of the size issue.

评论概述: Very well made! Great Quality Blazer!
评论详情: I was amazed at how well made this blazer was. This would be perfect for casual events in the winter where I live. I ordered a large even though it can be a hit or miss with online purchases,  this was on the money and fit me perfect 👌 I ordered me some pants that would match this perfect as well. I have 2 other Paul Jones Blazers and they both have the same great quality as this one. Tells me they really make the effort to bring great quality blazers at a great price which in turn brings satisfied customers like myself continuing to purchase them. Thank you for my 3rd fine blazer from Paul Jones. Once again extremely satisfied,  easy 5 stars and looking forward to getting more in the future 👍

评论概述: Do Not Hesitate, This is The Real Deal In Terms of Price and Quality
评论详情: For reference to this review, I'm 6'0" 175lbs and athletic build and size Large fits perfectly.If you are hesitating or have been stuck getting cheap or badly fitting blazers at this price range before, don't hesitate any longer.  This is a really nice blazer, and I have several from various price ranges and designers.  For work purposes, or expos, or events, or even a night out with friends in fall or winter months, this blazer really is well-made and looks nice.The fit is excellent and doesn't look square or boxy like others might.  The included pocket square is a nice touch.  The pockets come stitched closed but can be opened up if needed.  The material is nice to the skin and doesn't give you an itchy feeling around the neck area like other materials might.  The 25% wool blend really helps make this a blazer worth wearing.  The herringbone pattern makes this great with khakis or jeans.Overall, excellent blazer for the price.

评论概述: Very Distinguished and Well Made Blazer!
评论详情: Very Distinguished and Well Made Blazer!  Picture #1 & #2 shows the Nice color and detail on the Blazer.  All the pockets are usable, and well placed.  Picture #3 shows the V-Split in the back of the Blazer.  Picture #4 & #5 shows the dual inside Breast Pockets.  The Pocket on the Right is button down, to provide another layer of security for wallet, etc.  This Jacket fits me very nice Across the Shoulders, and Body length.  There is nothing that I need to have altered before I can wear and show off this Blazer.  Add a Tie or Bow tie and it will pass for Semi Formal.  Take off the Ties and you are ready for Casual evening out!

First off, for something ordered online... this fits perfectly, but I realize that is more luck. But... the material, outer shell, inner lining, buttons, seams... this is super nice quality, really good fit, and looks good. This is the kind of product that has you questioning why more expensive options even exist. I honestly am thinking about buying more of these it is that nice.

The jacket has a nice athletic fit. It can fit casually with a pair of jeans or dressed up with a pair of slacks. Wearing a turtleneck underneath in the winter or a no collar shirt during the summer will produce amazing results.
Zu klein
Fits well, good fabric
